participant_1.background:

i have the gene that lets me know when someones eaten asparagus.
I remember listening to Tupac Shakur in the back seat of my parents' car when I was a kid.

content.text: Pretty good! I got to play some violin today.
Oh wow that's awesome. I once convinced a police officer that my skunk was a service animal so he'd let me go.
That's so funny! I've never heard of that before.
Yeah it was pretty crazy. He was really confused when I told him that.
I bet he was! I'm glad it worked out for you though.
Thanks me too! What are you studying in school?
I'm studying law. I want to be a lawyer when I graduate.
Oh wow that's really cool! I'm sure you'll be a great lawyer.
Thanks! I hope so. I'm excited to start my career.
That's great! I'm sure you'll do great things.
